Rostov was not far from the trumpeters, and with his keen sight had recognized the Tsar and watched his approach. When he was with- in twenty paces, and Nicholas could clearly distinguish every detail of his handsome, hap- py young face, he experienced a feeling of tend- erness and ecstasy such as he had never be- fore known. Every trait and every movement of the Tsar's seemed to him enchanting. 
Stopping in front of the Pdvlograds, the Tsar said something in French
